mapper.select: select id, agent_id, task_name, description, cron_expression, task_param, status, create_time, update_time from ai_agent_task_schedule where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ai_agent_task_schedule(agent_id, task_name, description, cron_expression, task_param, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{agentId}, #{taskName}, #{description}, #{cronExpression}, #{taskParam}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into ai_agent_task_schedule(agent_id, task_name, description, cron_expression, task_param, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.agentId}, #{entity.taskName}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.cronExpression}, #{entity.taskParam}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into ai_agent_task_schedule(agent_id, task_name, description, cron_expression, task_param, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.agentId}, #{entity.taskName}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.cronExpression}, #{entity.taskParam}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update agent_id = values(agent_id), task_name = values(task_name), description = values(description), cron_expression = values(cron_expression), task_param = values(task_param), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update ai_agent_task_schedule
agent_id = #{agentId},
task_name = #{taskName},
description = #{description},
cron_expression = #{cronExpression},
task_param = #{taskParam},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
